LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Vacstone.label: compressed vacstone
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Vacstone.description: An ultra-dense mass of asteroid rock and dust, compacted over millennia into a near-indestructible block. Found only in deep space.
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Steel.label: compressed steel
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Steel.description: Ancient structural mass fused into a single, ultra-dense vacstone-steel deposit. Found only in deep space.
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Silver.label: compressed silver ore
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Silver.description: Silver-bearing rock compacted under extreme pressure into a dense, uniform seam. Found only in deep space.
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Gold.label: compressed gold ore
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Gold.description: Gold-rich strata crushed and recrystallized into a tight, resilient vein. Found only in deep space.
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Uranium.label: compressed uranium ore
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Uranium.description: Uranium-laden rock sintered into a nearly monolithic deposit, difficult to fracture. Found only in deep space.
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Plasteel.label: compressed plasteel
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Plasteel.description: Ultra-dense plasteel conglomerate formed in vacuum over generations; brutally tough to mine. Found only in deep space.
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Jade.label: compressed jade
LanguageData.VGE_Compressed_Jade.description: Jade-bearing vacstone compacted into a rigid, fine-grained mass. Found only in deep space.
